updated_cases.title: Validate GRE Access method SSL DND policy
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create access method based SSL DND policy and add 'GRE' as access method 
- Install GRE tunnel  on any device and route web traffic such as https://ifconfig.me
- Verify web page load correctly
- Verify page events generated.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify any page load correctly
- Verify Page event generated with "Bypass Reason:
SSL Do Not Decrypt Bypass Policy Matched" and acm based ssl DND policy in "Policy Name:" matched correctly
- Verify no proxy error logs
- Verify no proxy crash

updated_cases.title: Validate Windows OS SSL DND policy with Client Access method
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create OS Family based SSL DND policy and add 'Windows' in os_family
- Install NSClient on any device and route web traffic such as https://ifconfig.me
- Verify web page load correctly
- Verify page events generated.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify any page load correctly
- Verify Page event generated with "Bypass Reason:
SSL Do Not Decrypt Bypass Policy Matched" and OS Family based ssl DND policy in "Policy Name:" matched correctly and also look for os_version and os_family fields set correctly as of R112
- Verify no proxy error logs
- Verify no proxy crash

updated_cases.title: Validate Linux OS SSL DND policy with Ipsec Access method with nsclient installed

- Verify page events generated.

- Verify Page event generated with "Bypass Reason:
SSL Do Not Decrypt Bypass Policy Matched" and OS Family based ssl DND policy in "Policy Name:" matched correctly
- Verify no proxy error logs
- Verify no proxy crash
